data.name: TooltipPhysicalActivity
data.value: Physical Activity: opens the page of the tools for tracking physical activity for glucose consumption

data.name: DeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

data.name: TooltipBloodGlucose
data.value: Blood glucose: opens the page of glucose measurement events

data.name: TooltipInsulinCalculation
data.value: Insulin calculation: opens a page that calculates the quantity of insulin to inject before a meal

data.name: TooltipInjections
data.value: Injections: opens the page of past and present injections

data.name: TooltipFoodToHitTarget
data.value: Food to hit Target: opens the page that calculates the food one need to eat to hit a carbohydrates target

data.name: TooltipMeals
data.value: Meals: opens the page of meals done in the past

data.name: TooltipNewMeal
data.value: Meal: opens a new meal page

data.name: TooltipFoods
data.value: Foods: opens the page for foods management

data.name: TooltipRecipes
data.value: Recipes: opens the page of recipes management

data.name: TooltipChartsAndStatistics
data.value: Charts and Statistics: opens the page that searches past data, makes statistics and charts

data.name: TooltipPrediction
data.value: Prediction: opens the page that makes a simple prediction of the time of an hypoglicemia episode

data.name: TooltipMiscellaneous
data.value: Miscellaneous: opens the page of miscellaneous functions

data.name: TooltipAlarms
data.value: Alarms: opens the page of the alarms settings

data.name: TooltipConfigurations
data.value: Configurations: opens the page that assigns the program parameters

data.name: TooltipAbout
data.value: About: opens the page of information about this program

data.name: TooltipGlucoseMeasurement
data.value: Glucose measurement taken from the instrument

data.name: TooltipDateAndTimeOfMeasurement
data.value: Date and time of measurement of glucose

data.name: TooltipNowButton
data.value: Now: sets the date and time at the current instant

data.name: TooltipPlusButton
data.value: Plus: adds a new measurement with the data taken from UI

data.name: TooltipClearData
data.value: Clear Data: deletes the fields in the UI

data.name: TooltipInjectionSaveButton
data.value: Save: saves the data of the current food

data.name: TooltipRecipeSaveButton
data.value: Save: saves the data of the current recipe

data.name: TooltipFoodSaveButton
data.value: Save: saves the data of the current injection

data.name: TooltipMealSaveButton
data.value: Save: saves the data of the current meal

data.name: TooltipGlucoseSaveButton
data.value: Save: saves the data of the current glucose measurement

data.name: TooltipBreakfastCHOInsulinRatio
data.value: Morning CHO/insulin: carbohydrates per unit of insulin - breakfast time [CHO/UI]

data.name: TooltipLunchCHOInsulinRatio
data.value: Midday CHO/insulin: carbohydrates per unit of insulin - lunch time [CHO/UI]

data.name: TooltipDinnerCHOInsulinRatio
data.value: Evening CHO/insulin: carbohydrates per unit of insulin - dinner time [CHO/UI]

data.name: TooltipCalculateBolus
data.value: Calculate bolus: calculates the insulin bolus for this meal

data.name: TooltipInsulinCorrectionSensitivity
data.value: Blood glucose/insulin: glucose processed by one unit of insulin [mg/(dl*UI)]

data.name: TooltipParametersButton
data.value: Parameters: opens the page that calculates or sets sensitivity parameters

data.name: TooltipEmbarkedInsulinLabel
data.value: Embarked insulin: amount of insulin taken previously and still effective

data.name: TooltipRoundButton
data.value: Round: calculate the CHO to eat to inject a integer value of the insulin bolus

data.name: TooltipCurrentGlucose
data.value: Current glucose: glucose measured before the meal

data.name: TooltipTargetGlucose
data.value: Target: glucose to reach with calculated bolus

data.name: TooltipGlucoseToBeCorrected
data.value: To correct: glucose to be corrected, difference of the target value minus the current value

data.name: TooltipTargetCHO
data.value: Target CHO: carobydrates amount to eat to reach target glucose level

data.name: TooltipReadGlucose
data.value: Read glucose: read the last value of blood glucose stored in database

data.name: TooltipMeasureGlucose
data.value: Measure Glucose: opens the page that stores in database the measured glucose

data.name: TooltipInjectionButton
data.value: Injection: opens the page of injections to make a new

data.name: TooltipReadCHO
data.value: Read CHO: reads the value of carbohydrates of the current meal

data.name: TooltipCorrectionInsulinLabel
data.value: Correction insulin: insulin that brings the bool glucose level to target glucose

data.name: TooltipCHOInsulinLabel
data.value: CHO insulin: insulin that reduces amount of carbohydrates ingested during meal

data.name: TooltipTotalExclEmbarked
data.value: Total excluding embarked: insulin of the bolus when no insulin in left in the body (no embarked)

data.name: TooltipBolusLabel
data.value: Bolus: calculated insulin bolus to inject

data.name: TooltipCalculateFoodGrams
data.value: Food Calculator: calculates the grams of selected food that you have to eat to reach target carbohydrates

data.name: TooltipCHOFoodPercent
data.value: Carbohydrates percent of the food we want to eat to reach the target carbohydrates[%]

data.name: FoodToCompleteCHOBudget
data.value: Food to eat to complete the CHO budget

data.name: TooltipFoodToHitTargetGrams
data.value: Shot name of the food chosen to reach the target CHO

data.name: TooltipReadTargetCHO
data.value: Read target CHO: reads from the bolus calc's page the target CHO

data.name: TooltipReadEatenCHO
data.value: Reads from the meals' page the CHO already eaten

data.name: TooltipReadFoodCHO
data.value: Reads from the meals' page the CHO % of the selected food

data.name: TooltipReadAll
data.value: Read all the parameters useful to calculate remaining CHO

data.name: TooltipChoLeft
data.value: Remaining CHO: carbohydrates missing to eat to reach the target

data.name: FoodToHitTargetCHOGrams
data.value: Food to eat to reach target CHO [g]

data.name: TooltipMealAccuracyPercent
data.value: Numerical percent accuracy of the food [%]

data.value: Numerical percent accuracy of the meal [%]

data.name: TooltipMealAccuracyQualitative
data.value: Qualitative accuracy; accuracy of the food, as a word

data.name: TooltipFoodInMealAccuracyQualitative
data.value: Qualitative accuracy; accuracy of the meal, as a word

data.name: TooltipStartMeal
data.value: Start: saves the current time as the meal's start time

data.value: Glucose: opens the page of measurements of blood glucose

data.name: TooltipOpenBolusCalc
data.value: Bolus Calculation: opens the page that calculates the units of bolus' injection

data.name: TooltipOpenInjectionsPage
data.value: Injections: opens the page of injections

data.name: TooltipCalcTotalCHO
data.value: Calculate CHO: sums the total CHO of the meal and calculates its accuracy. Saves the values of the meal's foods.

data.name: TooltipOpenFoodToTargetPage
data.value: Food to target: opens the page that calculates the amount of food to eat to reach the CHO target.

data.name: TooltipFoodName
data.value: Name: short name of the food in meal

data.name: TooltipCalculator
data.value: Calculate: opens an arithmetic calculator to process the value that currently has the focus

data.name: TooltipCHOPercent
data.value: CHO%: percentuale di carboidrati di questo alimento [%]

data.name: TooltipUnitReset
data.value: Unit: unit of measurement chosen for this food. Click to return to grams.

data.name: TooltipQuantityUnits
data.value: Quantity : number of Units of this food in the meal [Unit]

data.name: TooltipCHOGrams
data.value: CHO: total quantity in grams of carbohydrate in this food of the meal [g]

data.name: TooltipOpenFoodsPage
data.value: Foods: opens the page to choose and import one food

data.name: TooltipWeighFood
data.value: Weigh: opens the page that helps in the weighing of the food

data.name: TooltipOpenRecipesPage
data.value: Recipes: opens the page of recipes' management

data.name: TooltipFoodsInMealList
data.value: Elenco degli alimenti in questo pasto

data.name: RecipeIsCooked
data.value: Cooked recipe: if checked the carbohydrates regard a cooked recipe, if not checked a raw recipe

data.value: Import Sensor Data: click to import glucose measurements from csv file of FreeStyle Libre continuous glucose monitor sensor

data.value: Glucose: select to view glucose measurements data

data.value: From date: select the start date for data analysis. This date has no influence on graph.

data.value: To date: select the finish date for data analysis or visualized date for graph.

data.name: TooltipStatistics
data.value: Statistics: click to open statistics page with numerical data analysis

data.value: Chart: click to open chart page with graphical data visualization

data.name: ImportSensorTitle
data.value: Import data from FreeStyle Libre sensor

data.name: TooltipImportSensor
data.value: Import from sensor: click to import glucose measurements from csv file of FreeStyle Libre continuous glucose monitor sensor

data.name: InvalidDateRangeMessage
data.value: The 'From' date cannot be later than the 'To' date.\nTo date moved to 1 day more than from date

data.name: ImportGlucoseConfirmMessage
data.value:
Select the file taken from your LibreView Web account.

The CSV file should contain glucose measurements from your Freestyle Libre sensor.

Continue?

data.name: BtnNowTooltip
data.value: Enter Now time: copies the current day and time to the date of the current glucose measurement

data.name: BtnNextTooltip
data.value: Enter the next glucose measurement: moves the current glucose measurement into the previous and copies time now in latest glucose measurement

data.name: BtnReadTooltip
data.value: Read: reads the last two glucose measurements from the database

data.name: BtnPredictTooltip
data.value: Predict: predicts the time at which the glucose will reach the value for alarm (prediction by linear extrapolation, use with caution)

data.name: TooltipGlucoseTarget
data.value: Alarm value: low glucose at which we want to take action against hypoglycemia

data.name: TooltipAlarmAdvanceTime
data.value: Time advance: time of anticipated alarm, with respect to the alarm value time [min]

data.name: TooltipSlope
data.value: Slope: rate of change of glucose [glucose units/hour]

data.name: ExpectedTimeHeader
data.value: Expected time of target glucose achievement

data.name: TooltipPredictedHour
data.value: Hours of the predicted 'low glucose' event

data.name: TooltipPredictedMinute
data.value: Minutes of the predicted 'low glucose' event

data.name: TooltipAlarmHour
data.value: Hours of the alarm event for low glucose

data.name: TooltipAlarmMinute
data.value: Minutes of the alarm event for low glucose

data.name: CalcDescription
data.value: Calculation of a future glucose value, starting from now and with current slope

data.name: BtnCalcTooltip
data.value: Calculates the future glucose after 'Time diff' minutes from 'current measurement' time (prediction uses the shown 'slope'). USE THIS WITH CAUTION!

data.name: FutureTimeDiffTooltip
data.value: Difference in minutes for prediction. From current measurement time

data.name: FutureGlucoseTooltip
data.value: Predicted glucose at 'future time' (USE WITH CAUTION!)

data.name: TooltipBackup
data.value: Creates a backup of the application database and settings

data.name: TooltipRestore
data.value: Restores the application database and settings from a backup

data.name: AppShortScope
data.value: GlucoMan is a Glucose Manager program for the diabetic person

data.name: AppAboutParagrah1
data.value: Helps with the daily operations needed to manage carbs counting. Currently manages data related to measured glucose, carbohydrates consumed during meals, foods, insulin injections.

data.name: AppAboutParagrah2
data.value: Calculates: the insulin bolus based on carbohydrates to be consumed during meals, the foods to eat to reach the desired carbohydrates and also a rough prediction of when blood sugar will reach a hypo value. It can visualize a graph of the past value of glucose and of the other paramaters.

data.name: AppAboutParagrah3
data.value: The program has provisions to manage recipes and helps in weighing the foods. Prototype functions are also included in the code but they are still in very preliminary development.

data.name: TooltipChoosePosition
data.value: Choose: closes the page remembering the current position, that will be saved in the other page

data.name: TooltipEscapePosition
data.value: Escape: closes the page forgetting the current position

data.name: TooltipEditReferencePoints
data.value: Edits the reference points if checked

data.name: TooltipDeleteReferencePoints
data.value: Deletes the reference points if checked

data.name: TooltipClickImage
data.value: Click on this image to set the point

data.name: TooltipContainerName
data.value: Name: short name of this container

data.name: TooltipContainerWeight
data.value: Weight: weight of the container in grams [g]

data.name: TooltipBack
data.value: Back: return to previous page without selecting

data.name: TooltipChoose
data.value: Choose: select this container and return to previous page

data.name: TooltipSave
data.value: Save: saves this container's data into the database

data.name: TooltipTakePicture
data.value: Picture: take a photo of the container with the camera

data.name: TooltipClearFields
data.value: Clear fields: clears all data in the UI

data.name: TooltipPlus
data.value: Plus: adds a new container with data from the UI

data.name: TooltipMinus
data.value: Minus: clear fields or remove selected container

data.name: TooltipContainersList
data.value: List of the containers saved in database

data.name: TooltipChooseWeighFood
data.value: Choose: save changes, return the modified food data and go back

data.name: TooltipEscapeWeighFood
data.value: Escape: cancel changes and return to the previous page

data.name: TooltipClearWeighFood
data.value: Clear: erase all the values in the boxes

data.name: WeighFoodToGetWeight
data.value: Weigh food to get weight of portion

data.name: TooltipRawFood
data.value: Raw food: if checked the value of CHO% of food is related to raw food. The cooked portion weight will be converted back to raw weight by these calculations

data.name: WeightDataRawFood
data.value: Weight data about ALL the food before cooking (raw)

data.name: TooltipSelectContainer
data.value: Click to select a container from the list

data.name: WeightDataCookedFood
data.value: Weight data about ALL the food after cooking (cooked)

data.name: WeightDataCookedPortion
data.value: Weight data about the cooked portion

data.name: TooltipWeighCookedPortion
data.value: Weigh the cooked portion: the CHO of the portion will be proportional to the measured weight of the cooked portion

data.name: TooltipEqualPortions
data.value: Divide all food into equal portions: the portion will be calculated by division of total food by N persons

data.name: CropZoomHint
data.value: To zoom: 🤏 Pinch | 🖱️ Drag green corners

data.name: CropResizeInstruction
data.value: To resize: 🤏 Pinch | 🖱️ Drag green corners

data.name: TooltipBreakfastRatio
data.value: Carbohydrates per unit of insulin - breakfast time

data.name: TooltipLunchRatio
data.value: Carbohydrates per unit of insulin - lunch time

data.name: TooltipDinnerRatio
data.value: Carbohydrates per unit of insulin - dinner time

data.name: TooltipSaveRatioCHOInsulin
data.value: Save: saves the sensitivities of carbohydrates to be used in the rest of the program

data.name: TypicalBolusesPerDay
data.value: Typical boluses made during a day [U]

data.name: TooltipTypicalBolusMorning
data.value: Typical amount of bolus of short duration insulin at morning

data.name: TooltipTypicalBolusMidday
data.value: Typical amount of bolus of short duration insulin at midday

data.name: TooltipTypicalBolusEvening
data.value: Typical amount of bolus of short duration insulin at evening

data.name: TooltipTypicalBolusNight
data.value: Typical amount of bolus of long duration insulin once a day

data.name: TooltipTDD
data.value: Total Daily Dose; sum of typical value of every kind of insulin in a day

data.name: TooltipSensitivityFactor
data.value: Coefficient that divides the total day insulin to obtain the sensitivity (Typical values taken from scientific literature)

data.name: TooltipCalculateInsulinSensitivity
data.value: Calculates sensitivity to insulin (sum of day insulin injections / chosen coefficient)

data.name: TooltipSaveInsulinSensitivity
data.value: Save: saves the sensitivity as a parameter of the program

data.name: TooltipShortActingInsulin
data.value: Name of the chosen short acting insulin

data.name: TooltipDurationShortActingInsulin
data.value: Duration of the chosen short acting insulin

data.name: TooltipLongActingInsulin
data.value: Name of the chosen long acting insulin

data.name: TooltipDurationLongActingInsulin
data.value: Duration of the chosen long acting insulin

data.name: MonthsDataShownInGrids
data.value: Months of data shown in the grids

data.name: TooltipMonthsDataShown
data.value: Months shown: month of data that will be shown in the grids of the program

data.name: TooltipInitialTimeBreakfast
data.value: Start day hour of breakfast in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.name: TooltipFinalTimeBreakfast
data.value: Finish day hour of breakfast in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.name: TooltipInitialTimeLunch
data.value: Start day hour of lunch in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.value: Finish day hour of lunch in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.value: Start day hour of dinner in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.name: TooltipFinalTimeDinner
data.value: Finish day hour of dinner in hours [0.0-24.0]

data.name: TooltipSaveSettings
data.value: Save: save the parameters in the database

data.name: CookedToRawRatio
data.value: Cooked to raw ratio: ratio between the cooked weight and the raw weight of the recipe

data.name: TooltipTotalCHOOfMeal
data.value: Total CHO of Meal: sum of the CHO in grams of the foods in the meal

data.name: ChartImageToClick
data.value: Chart: click to open chart page with graphical data visualization

data.name: TooltipImportDatabase
data.value: Substitutes the current database with user's chosen file

data.name: TooltipExportFiles
data.value: Export "interesting" Files and Data to "GlucoMan" folder inside "Download", from which they can be read

data.name: TooltipResetDatabase
data.value: Reset database, starting from scratch with no data

data.name: TooltipImportFoods
data.value: Import in this database all foods in another database
